New Records: Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 35 runs for Bangladesh, the highest for the team in this match.
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya scored 39 runs off 16 deliveries to lead India to victory.
Varun Chakravarthy and Arshdeep Singh each took 3 wickets apiece.
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and opted to bowl first.
Bangladesh's Litton Das and Najmul Hossain Shanto were key players to watch.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised the team's performance and adaptability.
Bangladesh's captain Najmul Hossain Shanto reflected on the team's struggles and future improvements.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the newly constructed Shrimant Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium in Gwalior.
Mayank Yadav made his debut for India in this match.
Others: The pitch was described as batting-friendly with high-scoring potential.
